graphql.query:
{
  pokemon {
    total
    pokemon {
      id
      name
      slug
      pokedexId
      sprite
      color
      shape
      habitat
      hp
      attack
      defense
      specialAttack
      specialDefense
      speed
      height
      weight
      isDefaultVariant
      isBaby
      isLegendary
      isMythical
      description
    }
  }
}
